articles.description: Sonata N Line is powered by Smartstream 2.5-litre turbocharged four-cylinder engine that delivers 290 horsepower and 421 Nm of torque.
articles.content: Hyundai Motor has revealed more details about its 2021 Sonata N Line, which is the first performance variant of the midsize sedan. After the launch of the new Sonata and Sonata Hybrid in 2019, the N … [+2400 chars]

articles.title: Tesla Tequila is intoxicating. And not for the reasons you think - HT Auto
articles.description: Tesla Tequila is priced at $250 per bottle but was sold out in no time despite the fact that there was no marketing for it..Tesla has zero experience making beverages of any kind and yet, the Tequila from the EV maker was lapped up by buyers.
articles.content: Tesla Tequila, or Teslaquila, has flown off the shelves shortly after being officially launched on the company website. For an organization that is known and renowned for its electric vehicles (EVs),… [+1928 chars]
